title: Chicken Salad
description: Delicious chicken salad for those bodybuilding with only 700 calories and 100g Protein. Credit to Martin Berkhan.
directions: Grab a large bowl and begin to fill it with the following in this order;
Iceberg salad, chopped mushrooms, one whole egg, chicken strips, low-fat dressing (your choice)
The chicken strips should be prepared before hand but can be created based on your preference.
